product_data.name: Airspun - Coty Airspun Loose Face Powder
product_data.description:
Airspun Coty Airspun Loose Face Powder

Enhance your beauty routine with the Airspun Coty Airspun Loose Face Powder. This iconic face powder has been a favorite among makeup enthusiasts for decades, thanks to its lightweight formula and flawless finish. Whether you're looking to set your makeup for all-day wear or simply want to reduce shine, this loose powder is a must-have in your makeup bag.

Key Features:

  • Face Makeup
  • Face Powder
  • Loose Powder
  • Airspun

Benefits:

  • Long-lasting wear
  • Controls shine
  • Blurs imperfections
  • Sets makeup

How to Use:

After applying your foundation and concealer, use a fluffy brush to lightly dust the Airspun Coty Airspun Loose Face Powder over your face. Focus on areas that tend to get oily, such as the T-zone. For a more matte finish, press the powder into your skin using a sponge.

Benefits:

  • Long-lasting wear: The Airspun Coty Airspun Loose Face Powder helps your makeup stay in place all day, preventing it from creasing or fading.
  • Controls shine: Say goodbye to unwanted shine with this loose powder that mattifies your skin without looking cakey.
  • Blurs imperfections: This face powder blurs the appearance of fine lines, pores, and blemishes, giving you a smooth and flawless complexion.
  • Sets makeup: Lock in your makeup look with the Airspun Coty Airspun Loose Face Powder to ensure it stays put throughout the day and night.

Experience the magic of the Airspun Coty Airspun Loose Face Powder and achieve a radiant and flawless complexion every time you apply your makeup. Whether you're a makeup beginner or a seasoned pro, this face powder is a versatile and essential product that will elevate your beauty routine.
product_data.short_description: Shop the best Face Makeup online with Airspun Coty Airspun Loose Face Powder. Get the perfect finish with this top-rated Loose Powder at the best price in Bangladesh. Buy now!

line_items.name: W7 - Liquid Eyeliner - Black

product_data.name: W7 - Liquid Eyeliner - Black
product_data.description:
Enhance your eye makeup game with the W7 Liquid Eyeliner. This high-quality liquid eyeliner from W7 is a must-have in your makeup collection. Whether you are going for a subtle everyday look or a dramatic evening look, this eyeliner will help you achieve the perfect winged eyeliner or cat-eye effortlessly.

The W7 Liquid Eyeliner is formulated with a long-lasting, smudge-proof formula that ensures your eyeliner stays put all day without fading or smudging. The intense black color adds depth and definition to your eyes, making them pop and stand out. The precision applicator allows for easy and precise application, so you can create sharp and clean lines with ease.

Benefits:

  • Intense black color adds depth and definition to your eyes
  • Long-lasting, smudge-proof formula
  • Precision applicator for easy and precise application
  • Creates sharp and clean lines effortlessly

How to Use:

  1. Shake the eyeliner before use to ensure the formula is well-mixed.
  2. Starting from the inner corner of your eye, draw a thin line along your lash line.
  3. For a winged eyeliner look, extend the line slightly past the outer corner of your eye and flick it upwards.
  4. Allow the eyeliner to dry for a few seconds before blinking to prevent smudging.
  5. Remove the eyeliner with a makeup remover at the end of the day.

Whether you are a makeup novice or a beauty enthusiast, the W7 Liquid Eyeliner is perfect for creating a variety of eye makeup looks. Its versatile formula and easy-to-use applicator make it suitable for everyone, regardless of skill level. Add this liquid eyeliner to your makeup routine and elevate your eye makeup game to the next level.

Don't miss out on the opportunity to enhance your eye makeup with the W7 Liquid Eyeliner. Buy yours today and experience the difference it can make in your makeup routine. Say goodbye to smudged eyeliner and hello to sharp, defined eyes with this must-have product from W7.

line_items.parent_name: Absolute New York - 5d Eyelash Brush Adhesive - Fast Drying

product_data.name: Absolute New York - 5d Eyelash Brush Adhesive - Fast Drying
product_data.description:
Absolute New York 5d Eyelash Brush Adhesive - Fast Drying

Enhance your eye makeup game with the Absolute New York 5d Eyelash Brush Adhesive. This fast-drying glue is the perfect solution for achieving flawless and long-lasting eyelashes. Whether you're a makeup enthusiast or a professional artist, this adhesive will ensure your eyelashes stay in place all day.

Benefits:

  • Fast-drying formula for quick application
  • Long-lasting hold to keep your eyelashes in place
  • Easy-to-use brush applicator for precise application
  • Secure bond for all-day wear
  • Formulated to be gentle on the eyes

How to Use:

  1. Start by gently removing the false eyelashes from the packaging.
  2. Apply a thin layer of the Absolute New York 5d Eyelash Brush Adhesive to the base of the false eyelashes.
  3. Wait a few seconds for the glue to become tacky.
  4. Using a pair of tweezers, carefully place the false eyelashes as close to your natural lash line as possible.
  5. Press down gently to secure the lashes in place.
  6. Allow the adhesive to dry completely before applying any additional eye makeup.

Whether you're looking to add a touch of glamour to your everyday look or create a bold and dramatic eye makeup look, the Absolute New York 5d Eyelash Brush Adhesive is a must-have in your beauty arsenal. With its fast-drying formula and long-lasting hold, you can trust that your eyelashes will stay put all day and night.

Don't settle for subpar eyelash glue that doesn't deliver on its promises. Upgrade to the Absolute New York 5d Eyelash Brush Adhesive and experience the difference for yourself. Say goodbye to pesky eyelash mishaps and hello to flawless eye makeup every time.

product_data.name: Cosrx - Advanced Snail 96 Mucin Power Essence - 100ml
product_data.description:
Welcome to the world of K-Beauty with Cosrx Advanced Snail 96 Mucin Power Essence! This revolutionary face care product is a must-have in your skincare routine, offering a powerful essence that is sure to transform your skin. With its unique formulation and potent ingredients, this essence is designed to hydrate, repair, and rejuvenate your skin for a radiant and youthful complexion.

Formulated with 96% snail mucin extract, this essence is packed with nutrients and antioxidants that work wonders for your skin. Snail mucin is known for its ability to promote skin regeneration, repair damaged skin, and improve skin texture. It also helps to hydrate the skin, reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, and brighten the complexion.

One of the key benefits of the Cosrx Advanced Snail 96 Mucin Power Essence is its lightweight and fast-absorbing formula. This essence penetrates deep into the skin, delivering moisture and nutrients where they are needed most. It is suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin, and can be used both day and night for maximum benefits.

How to Use:

  • Cleanse your face and pat dry.
  • Apply a small amount of the essence to your fingertips.
  • Gently pat the essence onto your skin, focusing on areas that need extra hydration or repair.
  • Follow with your favorite moisturizer.
  • Use daily for best results.

Benefits:

  • Hydrates and nourishes the skin.
  • Repairs and rejuvenates damaged skin.
  • Reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
  • Brightens and evens out the complexion.
  • Fast-absorbing formula suitable for all skin types.

Experience the power of snail mucin with Cosrx Advanced Snail 96 Mucin Power Essence. Transform your skin and achieve a radiant and youthful complexion with this innovative face care product. Add it to your skincare routine today and say hello to healthy, glowing skin!

line_items.parent_name: AXIS-Y - Dark Spot Correcting Glow Serum

product_data.name: AXIS-Y - Dark Spot Correcting Glow Serum
product_data.description:
AXIS-Y Dark Spot Correcting Glow Serum

Discover the secret to radiant, flawless skin with the AXIS-Y Dark Spot Correcting Glow Serum. This innovative K-Beauty face serum is specially formulated to target dark spots, hyperpigmentation, and uneven skin tone, leaving your complexion looking brighter and more even-toned.

AXIS-Y is a leading Korean skincare brand known for its high-quality, effective products that harness the power of natural ingredients to deliver real results. The Dark Spot Correcting Glow Serum is no exception, featuring a potent blend of key ingredients that work together to fade dark spots and reveal a luminous, radiant complexion.

Benefits:

  • Reduces the appearance of dark spots and hyperpigmentation
  • Improves skin tone and texture
  • Hydrates and nourishes the skin
  • Enhances skin's natural glow
  • Minimizes the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles

How to Use:

1. After cleansing and toning, apply a few drops of the serum to your fingertips.

2. Gently massage the serum into your skin, focusing on areas with dark spots or hyperpigmentation.

3. Allow the serum to fully absorb before applying moisturizer or sunscreen.

4. Use morning and night for best results.

Whether you're dealing with stubborn dark spots or simply want to achieve a more radiant complexion, the AXIS-Y Dark Spot Correcting Glow Serum is the perfect addition to your skincare routine. Say goodbye to uneven skin tone and hello to a brighter, more luminous glow with this powerful serum.

Don't let dark spots dull your natural beauty – try the AXIS-Y Dark Spot Correcting Glow Serum today and reveal the flawless skin you deserve.

line_items.name: Cosrx - Acne Pimple Master Patch

product_data.name: Cosrx - Acne Pimple Master Patch
product_data.description:
Welcome to the world of K-Beauty with Cosrx Acne Pimple Master Patch! This innovative product is a game-changer in the realm of skincare, offering a solution to pesky pimples and acne that is both effective and easy to use. Made by the renowned Korean brand Cosrx, known for their high-quality skincare products, this Acne Pimple Master Patch is a must-have for anyone looking to achieve clear, blemish-free skin.

One of the standout features of this product is its versatility. While it is primarily designed to target and treat acne and pimples, it can also be used as a sleeping mask to help soothe and heal the skin overnight. This dual functionality makes it a convenient and cost-effective addition to your skincare routine.

The Cosrx Acne Pimple Master Patch is made with high-quality materials that are gentle on the skin, making it suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin. The patches are ultra-thin and transparent, allowing for discreet wear during the day or overnight. They adhere securely to the skin, ensuring maximum efficacy in treating pimples and preventing further breakouts.

How to Use:

  • Before applying the patch, cleanse and dry the affected area of the skin.
  • Choose a patch that is slightly larger than the blemish and apply it directly onto the pimple.
  • Leave the patch on for several hours or overnight for best results.
  • Remove the patch and discard after use.

Benefits:

  • Effectively targets and treats acne and pimples.
  • Can be used as a sleeping mask to soothe and heal the skin overnight.
  • Ultra-thin and transparent patches for discreet wear.
  • Gentle on the skin and suitable for all skin types.
  • Adheres securely to the skin for maximum efficacy.

Don't let acne and pimples stand in the way of achieving clear, radiant skin. With Cosrx Acne Pimple Master Patch, you can say goodbye to blemishes and hello to a flawless complexion. Try it today and experience the power of K-Beauty for yourself!

product_data.description:
Experience the ultimate in K-Beauty with the Beauty of Joseon Red Bean Refreshing Pore Mask. Benefits:

  • Deeply cleanses pores

  • Provides a refreshing and revitalizing experience
  • Leaves skin looking and feeling its best

How to Use:

  1. Start by cleansing your face with your favorite cleanser.
  2. Apply a generous amount of the mask to your face, avoiding the eye and mouth areas.
  3. Leave the mask on for 10-15 minutes.
  4. Rinse off with warm water and pat dry.
  5. Follow up with your favorite moisturizer.

Beauty of Joseon is known for its commitment to quality and effectiveness, and this Red Bean Refreshing Pore Mask is no exception. The red bean extract in this mask helps to deeply cleanse pores, while also reducing their appearance for a smoother, more refined complexion. This mask is perfect for those looking to achieve a more even skin tone and texture.

In addition to red bean extract, this mask also contains other key ingredients such as kaolin clay and rice powder, which work together to help absorb excess oil and impurities, leaving your skin feeling fresh and clean. The gentle formula is suitable for all skin types, making it a versatile option for anyone looking to improve their skin's overall health and appearance.

Whether you're new to K-Beauty or a seasoned enthusiast, the Beauty of Joseon Red Bean Refreshing Pore Mask is sure to become a favorite in your skincare routine. Try it today and experience the benefits of this innovative and effective face mask.

product_data.name: Loreal Paris - Matte Resistance Liquid Lipstick
product_data.description:
Loreal Paris Matte Resistance Liquid Lipstick is a must-have addition to your makeup collection. This high-quality lipstick offers a long-lasting, matte finish that will keep your lips looking flawless all day long. With its rich, vibrant colors and smooth application, this liquid matte lipstick is sure to become your go-to choice for any occasion.

Benefits:

  • Long-lasting formula that stays put for hours
  • Matte finish for a modern, on-trend look
  • Rich, vibrant colors that make a statement
  • Smooth application for easy and precise use

How to Use:

1. Start by exfoliating your lips to create a smooth canvas for the lipstick.

2. Apply a lip balm to moisturize and prep your lips.

3. Use the wand applicator to apply the lipstick starting from the center of your lips and working outwards.

4. Allow the lipstick to dry for a few seconds for a matte finish.

5. Reapply as needed throughout the day for touch-ups.

Whether you're heading to a special event or just want to add a pop of color to your everyday look, Loreal Paris Matte Resistance Liquid Lipstick is the perfect choice. The liquid matte formula glides on smoothly and dries down to a gorgeous matte finish that won't budge. With a wide range of shades to choose from, you can find the perfect color to complement any outfit or mood.

Not only does this lipstick look great, but it also offers long-lasting wear that will keep you looking flawless from morning until night. Say goodbye to constant touch-ups and reapplications – with Loreal Paris Matte Resistance Liquid Lipstick, your lip color will stay put for hours on end.

Don't settle for subpar lipsticks that fade and smudge throughout the day. Upgrade your makeup routine with Loreal Paris Matte Resistance Liquid Lipstick and enjoy a bold, beautiful look that lasts. Whether you're a makeup novice or a beauty pro, this lipstick is sure to become a staple in your collection.
